name: Patriotic Star Panel
shortDescription: Hand-burned star pattern on solid wood. Pure Americana.
description: Each star is individually burned into solid wood, creating a rich patriotic display that brings warmth to any wall. The natural wood grain shows through the burn pattern, making every panel one of a kind. Available in multiple sizes. Built in America, about America.

name: Wooden Cross — White
shortDescription: Hand-painted white wooden cross. Simple. Beautiful.
description: A clean, hand-painted wooden cross that makes a statement through simplicity. Solid wood construction with a smooth white finish and subtle hand-painted detail on one end. Perfect for a living room, bedroom, or as a meaningful gift. Each one is made by hand in our workshop.

name: Rustic Cross Shadow Box
shortDescription: Dark stained cross assemblage in a shadow box frame.
description: This is not your average wall cross. Built from layered reclaimed wood pieces with a prominent cross in the center, framed in a dark stained shadow box. The mixed wood tones and textures create depth and character that photographs can't fully capture. A powerful statement piece.

name: Roman Numeral Wall Clock
shortDescription: Handmade wooden clock with burned Roman numerals.
description: Time meets craftsmanship. Each Roman numeral is hand-burned into solid wood with decorative circle borders. The warm wood tones and deep red-brown burn marks give this clock a rich, Old-World character. Includes quartz movement for accurate timekeeping. A functional piece of art for any room.

name: American Eagle Wall Art
shortDescription: Eagle and American flag. Wood-burned. Stunning detail.
description: A bold American eagle set against the stars and stripes, entirely wood-burned by hand into a solid wood panel. The level of detail in the feathers, the flag's movement, and the eagle's expression makes this one of our most striking pieces. A conversation starter and a statement of pride.

name: 1776 Betsy Ross Plaque
shortDescription: 1776 with the original 13 stars. Heritage on wood.
description: The number that started it all, surrounded by the original 13 stars of the Betsy Ross flag. Hand-burned into solid wood with a dark stained border frame. This is American heritage distilled into a single piece of wall art. Makes a powerful gift for anyone who values where we came from.

name: Rustic Coffee Table
shortDescription: Torched-finish coffee table. Solid wood. Built to last.
description: Our signature coffee table features a stunning torched finish that brings out the natural beauty of the wood grain. Built with heavy-duty joinery and finished with multiple coats of polyurethane for durability. This table anchors a room — it's built to handle real life and look better with age.

name: Custom Commission
shortDescription: Have something specific in mind? Let's build it together.
description: Every great piece starts with a conversation. Tell me what you need — a custom table, wall art, a gift for someone who matters. We'll talk about wood, dimensions, finish, and budget. I'll build it by hand, right here in my workshop. Call me at (518) 527-7449 or use the contact form. Starting at $100.
